mapper.sql: SELECT WifiRouterID, FactoryRouterID, HardID, HardSeq, RouterAddr, RouterCont, RouterTel, RouterDinate, RouterAgents, DevName, AuthSrv, SjSrv, MngSrv, DefRedirect, CsType, UrlData, HeartbeatTime, BusinessShopID, Longitude, Latitude, MaxConnectCount, IntroductionURL, AppEntranceID, WanIp, PortNumber, LoginName, PassWord, TaskID, RouterNotice, BrowseGuide, ComputerGuide, BrowseGuideType FROM Wifi_WifiRouter
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Wifi_WifiRouter(WifiRouterID, FactoryRouterID, HardID, HardSeq, RouterAddr, RouterCont, RouterTel, RouterDinate, RouterAgents, DevName, AuthSrv, SjSrv, MngSrv, DefRedirect, CsType, UrlData, HeartbeatTime, BusinessShopID, Longitude, Latitude, MaxConnectCount, IntroductionURL, AppEntranceID, WanIp, PortNumber, LoginName, PassWord, TaskID, RouterNotice, BrowseGuide, ComputerGuide, BrowseGuideType) VALUES(#{BusinesShopID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'>'+#{DevName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'.'+#{HardSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+':'+LTRIM(STR(#{FactoryRouterID,jdbcType=BIGINT})), #{FactoryRouterID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{HardID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{HardSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RouterAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RouterCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RouterTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RouterDinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RouterAgents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DevName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AuthSrv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SjSrv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MngSrv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DefRedirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{UrlData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{HeartbeatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BusinesShopID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{Latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{MaxConnectCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{IntroductionURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AppEntranceID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WanIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PortNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{LoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PassWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TaskID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{RouterNotice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BrowseGuide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ComputerGuide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BrowseGuideType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE Wifi_WifiRouter SET FactoryRouterID = #{FactoryRouterID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, HardID = #{HardID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, HardSeq = #{HardSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RouterAddr = #{RouterAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RouterCont = #{RouterCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RouterTel = #{RouterTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RouterDinate = #{RouterDinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RouterAgents = #{RouterAgents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DevName = #{DevName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AuthSrv = #{AuthSrv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SjSrv = #{SjSrv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MngSrv = #{MngSrv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DefRedirect = #{DefRedirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CsType = #{CsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UrlData = #{UrlData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HeartbeatTime = #{HeartbeatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BusinessShopID = #{BusinesShopID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Longitude = #{Longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Latitude = #{Latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MaxConnectCount = #{MaxConnectCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IntroductionURL = #{IntroductionURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppEntranceID = #{AppEntranceID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WanIp = #{WanIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PortNumber = #{PortNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LoginName = #{LoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PassWord = #{PassWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TaskID = #{TaskID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RouterNotice = #{RouterNotice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BrowseGuide = #{BrowseGuide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ComputerGuide = #{ComputerGuide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BrowseGuideType = #{BrowseGuideType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WifiRouterID = #{BusinesShopID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'>'+#{DevName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'.'+#{HardSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+':'+LTRIM(STR(#{FactoryRouterID,jdbcType=BIGINT})) WHERE WifiRouterID = #{WifiRouterID}

UPDATE Wifi_WifiRouter
FactoryRouterID = #{FactoryRouterID},
HardID = #{HardID},
HardSeq = #{HardSeq},
RouterAddr = #{RouterAddr},
RouterCont = #{RouterCont},
RouterTel = #{RouterTel},
RouterDinate = #{RouterDinate},
RouterAgents = #{RouterAgents},
DevName = #{DevName},
AuthSrv = #{AuthSrv},
SjSrv = #{SjSrv},
MngSrv = #{MngSrv},
DefRedirect = #{DefRedirect},
CsType = #{CsType},
UrlData = #{UrlData},
HeartbeatTime = #{HeartbeatTime},
BusinessShopID = #{BusinesShopID},
Longitude = #{Longitude},
Latitude = #{Latitude},
MaxConnectCount = #{MaxConnectCount},
IntroductionURL = #{IntroductionURL},
AppEntranceID = #{AppEntranceID},
WanIp = #{WanIp},
PortNumber = #{PortNumber},
LoginName = #{LoginName},
PassWord = #{PassWord},
TaskID = #{TaskID},
RouterNotice = #{RouterNotice},
BrowseGuide = #{BrowseGuide},
WifiRouterID = #{BusinesShopID}+'>'+#{DevName}+'.'+#{HardSeq}+':'+LTRIM(STR(#{FactoryRouterID}))
WHERE WifiRouterID = #{WifiRouterID};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Wifi_WifiRouter WHERE WifiRouterID like '%.'+#{HardSeq}+':%'
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM Wifi_WifiRouter where BusinessShopID like #{BusinessShopID}
select count(*) FROM Wifi_WifiRouter where BusinessShopID like #{AgentID} + '_%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Wifi_WifiRouter(WifiRouterID, FactoryRouterID, HardSeq, RouterAddr, RouterCont, RouterTel, DevName, BusinessShopID, AppEntranceID, Longitude, Latitude, AuthSrv, SjSrv, DefRedirect, CsType, UrlData, HeartbeatTime) VALUES(#{BusinesShopID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'>'+#{DevName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'.'+#{HardSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+':'+LTRIM(STR(#{FactoryRouterID,jdbcType=BIGINT})), #{FactoryRouterID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{HardSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RouterAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RouterCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RouterTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DevName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BusinesShopID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AppEntranceID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{Latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{AuthSrv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SjSrv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DefRedirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{UrlData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{HeartbeatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
